subject: Re: Simsonn Pro Pedals and Pro Plus Pedals Upgrade Kit
description_text:

I have ordered the full kit with dampers for 3 pedals.

Have you considered starting your own subreddit for Simsonn?

regards

Aidan

conversations.body_text: Hi Aidan,  We already have a subreddit, you can search for it.
